job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related discipline

jd: From: Anoop, Sspearhead Inc. anoop@sspearhead.com Reply to: anoop@sspearhead.com Job Details:Java Websphere Consultant- Day 1 onsiteAlbany, NYLong Term Mandatory Qualification Software ArchitectMakes high-level design choices and dictates technical standards, including software coding standards, tools, and platforms. Designs multi-leveled architecture or component interactions of a large scale software system. Expert84+ Months: Candidate is able to provide guidance to large teams and/or has extensive industry experience and is considered at the top of his/her field. Qualification Number Requested Qualifications:1. 84 months of experience developing Java web applications in WebSphere version 8 (or later)2. 84 months of experience developing with IBM Rational Application Developer (RAD) version 8 (or later), or ITM Rational System Architect (RSA) version 8 or later3. 84 months of experience developing and maintaining Java web applications using LDAP4. 84 months of experience creating accessible websites that are 508 and/or WCAG 2.0 compliant5. 48 months of experience integrating Okta security into Java web applications6. 84 months of experience developing and maintaining Java web applications using web services7. 84 months of experience developing and maintaining Java web applications using JSF8. 84 months of experience developing and maintaining Java web applications using JSP9. 84 months of experience developing and maintaining Java web applications using Javascript10. Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related discipline Thanks,AnoopSspearhead Inc.www.Sspearhead.com
